title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, the tool items move below the label.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label no matter how small the view gets. The close button should remain in the far right corner.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to make it smaller.
3. Observe that the tool items move below the label.
